channel.title: Do not play RSCE or RSCDaemon
channel.description:
Luke(the owner) is an idiot
Not going to make a tl;dr post so I'll sum it up.
Played it for a few weeks, so i decided to donate 50$ to help the server out because so far it was good. Turns out most people on that server suck at staking so I become one of the top 5 richest players with about 250m cash... word got out that I had alot of cash so one of his corrupt mods gave out my IP to a hacker and they somehow installed a RAT onto my computer (no i didn't visit any websites etc)
Account got hacked so I asked Kryptix(luke) for my account back.. didn't care about the cash at all. He then banned my account and deleted it and muted 2 new characters I made asking him why. I made a final character and a mod PM'ed me saying if I donate 100$ to the server I will get my account back. LOL
Kid doesn't care about hosting servers at all, all he wants is $
IGN was Military, I'm sure some of your RSCE players will vouch this story.
Btw, I'm not "new" to this forum at all I just don't ever post, been here since 06 and have played 3-4 RSC private servers since then.
My fav was PP2p :p

item.title: Do not play RSCE or RSCDaemon
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

Kryptix:

[quote author=JUMPHIM link=topic=539137.msg3985728#msg3985728 date=1335841271]but it looks like it may be coming to a stop.

It’s only coming to a stop because I haven’t touched RSCE in months. It will boom again when we launch RSCD.

As I’ve said before, I see RSCE as a trial run and yes I’ve made mistakes but so has everyone else. RSCD will be ran a lot differently but no doubt certain people will hold grudges and be negative regardless.[/quote]

I’m not trying to be a dick, just saying with all the complaints even if your switching to something better, you always want to keep your customers best interest and let’s face it, your server is a business and you want to exceed your goals.

Only way you can make them truly happy is make policy post them in there own personal section when ever a problem occurs, they can read on the best way they can get that problem taken care of.

hell if i wore you i make all mods invisible no way to speak on global make um like shadows in the back ground it would make it were no bull shit could be said about any of um

Read full topic

OP: Kinda dumb shelling out 50$ to someone you don’t know, I’d stick to just playing for fun. Not siding with Kryptix but it’s kinda like asking the sun to stop shining in your eyes.

item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

[quote=“Pompano21, post:34, topic:436423”]You can’t just blame Luke because you installed something on your computer and got hacked. If people could install stuff on your computer through an IP then there would be a lot more people being hacked.

Stop crying and get over it.[/quote]
sorry pomp i like you bro but how much is he paying you ?

its true we all know that he’s a jerk and he should probably learn how to manage his business a lil better .
I think if he really cared about rsce and his player base, he would address the complaints in a more professional manner rather then sounding like a complete prick.

Ill give him his credit he knows how to keep a server running, but it looks like it may be coming to a stop.

Read full topic

item.source: Do not play RSCE or RSCDaemon

item.title: Do not play RSCE or RSCDaemon
item.dc:creator: @imabeast imabeast
item.description:
@imabeast wrote:

[quote=“TheAlmightyKing, post:74, topic:436423”]For the bump, but the person above with all the RATS. I believe he still has people infected, I’m not sure though but someone was hacked on my server yesterday because they were infected and they had a RAT on their computer which I removed for them.

It was located @

"C:/users/(username)/AppData/Local/Temp/iedevtool.exe"

Also

"C:/users/(username)/AppData/Roaming/Sysglobal.exe"

The files are hidden even when I turned the View > Show Hidden Files.

Also remove it from Msconfig. I’m just guessing its the same person above because the person on my server said he only played RSCE and other private servers on his computer(RSC).

Just a note to check that whoever plays RSC Servers or whoever might think they’re infected.[/quote]

doubt it’s the same person, the guy who hacked me was an active hackforum member and he was qqing on there about his paypals getting hacked due to himself having a RAT lmao

Read full topic

I am an idiot knowing ive been doing this along time and hes not the first person to even remotely try and come after me. The ips are used by thousands of people and kryptex has no clue when the fuck it was hacked. The company doesnt have a 1800 number and if they do get contacted they are going to want way more then a fucking kid saying someone stole someones gp on a game or anything. THEY WILL WANT PROOF FROM LAW ENFORCEMENT… I’m clearly not an idiot and you are clearly jealous.

item.source: Do not play RSCE or RSCDaemon

item.title: Do not play RSCE or RSCDaemon
item.dc:creator: @Dgc2002 Dgc2002
item.description:
@Dgc2002 wrote:

[quote=“The Alamonian, post:61, topic:436423”][quote author=Kryptix link=topic=539137.msg3947454#msg3947454 date=1332007609]

[ol][li]OP got hacked because he visited a URL spammed in-game advertising another private server that was actually a RAT.[/li]
[li]OP claimed a staff member gave out his IP because they knew he was rich and the hacker managed to install a RAT on his PC using only his IP address.[/li]
[li]OP claimed he was using a Government PC in an attempt to scare the hacker.[/li]
[li]OP continuously blamed everyone but himself, criticising the staff and management for his mistake.[/li]
[li]OP went even more mental when I told him the only way to recover his account was via his recovery questions which he did not set despite being warned every time he logged in.[/li]
[li]I looked into the situation and all associated accounts of the hacker was banned. No items could be recovered.[/li]
[li]OP was warned multiple times that if he didn’t stop spamming Global Chat on various accounts he would be banned. OP continued. And continued some more.[/li]
[li]OP was eventually banned.[/li]
[li]OP then comes onto Mopar making up bullshit to exaggerate the situation and severity claiming that a moderator wanted 100$ PayPal to unban him. This did not happen.[/li]
[li]The anti-Kryptix brigade feel this is an appropriate time to side with anyone that isn’t Kryptix.[/li][/ol]

And for anyone that thinks it’s ‘harsh’ for him being banned, I can’t let someone spout bullshit continuously in-game to 200 players online especially when they’re claiming the staff are giving out IP addresses which allows your computer to be instantly hacked. Not everyone is computer literate and it’s that kind of malicious shit that gives private servers a bad name.

The kid is a tool and anyone that actually believes the rubbish that comes out of his mouth needs their head checking.
[/quote]

Gotta put my 2 cents in since I was the one using a JDB to get all these rsce noobs lol…

  • Story starts with me needing $750-1000 for something online and not wanting to spend my real life $$ on it.

First I started ratting rs2 noobs in the G.E. I got about 2b in a week in a half… not bad. - made $1100 off it. I then decided I would like to play rsc again since of course its my bread and butter… Rsce is obviously the only server with a player base and gp that means anything. So i bought Hotspot Shield Pro, ProVpsn and a few other ip programs. I created multiple characters and spammed the game for 2-3 days with 3 different jdb sites promising noobs the best rsc experience of there lives… Idiots starting popping up on BlackShades like nats…I started checking logs and found I got a some guys with 1b-2b each, plus a idiot mod. So of course i got on a few different ips, pked the characters with items in invy or used the party room and also had some nice drop parties. I then threw out there passwords to detour me from being caught. Then found a few noobs who didn’t wanna pay 7 dollars for a lousy subscription. Made about 800-1000 dollars in 2 days via western union. Still had about 15-20 hats left so decided to stake them a bit. Won a few…lost a few… sold the rest. Then decided to recheck some characters and found about 20-30 more phats and about 200m cash… still had them up until today when I sold all of it to another player.

I was never caught, I was never banned. Luke did not take care of anything. If the kid was smart at all he would spawn him some gold and sell to players because that makes 1000x what his server makes in donations… It might ruin the economy but who cares the damn servers going to be down when he puts up his new trash server.

Feel free to rant,rave, demand proof… I got all of it.

heres a bit…

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

PS. Luke You Pedo, You can try to retaliate but you will not get me, I use way to many proxies and my real computer ip will not be found. Every ip you try will fail and as I write this I am updating my ip again, BUT PLEASE!! waste your time and try to get me. We all know your going to rage after seeing how much I pwnt you for and how many characters I unbanned with lots and lotsa geepee. Deny it all you want, make up some reasons how I didn’t, everyone here knows how you are, and since i will be banned shortly for showing that I RAT I just gotta say… I look forward to selling all your players gold again in the near future.

Thank you for the - Kinect Sensor, $1600 total via Western Union, new car exhaust system, new ram air hood, and MY FAVORITE, MY NEW ALIENWARE LAPTOP All in less then a week by the way.[/quote]

Fucking kids these days… Do you get all your tech knowledge from CSI/CSI:Miami/CSI:New York/NCIS?

Read full topic

Not everyone is computer literate and it’s that kind of malicious shit that gives private servers a bad name.

The kid is a tool and anyone that actually believes the rubbish that comes out of his mouth needs their head checking.

Gotta put my 2 cents in since I was the one using a JDB to get all these rsce noobs lol…

  • Story starts with me needing $750-1000 for something online and not wanting to spend my real life $$ on it.

First I started ratting rs2 noobs in the G.E. I got about 2b in a week in a half… not bad. - made $1100 off it. I then decided I would like to play rsc again since of course its my bread and butter… Rsce is obviously the only server with a player base and gp that means anything. So i bought Hotspot Shield Pro, ProVpsn and a few other ip programs. I created multiple characters and spammed the game for 2-3 days with 3 different jdb sites promising noobs the best rsc experience of there lives… Idiots starting popping up on BlackShades like nats…I started checking logs and found I got a some guys with 1b-2b each, plus a idiot mod. So of course i got on a few different ips, pked the characters with items in invy or used the party room and also had some nice drop parties. I then threw out there passwords to detour me from being caught. Then found a few noobs who didn’t wanna pay 7 dollars for a lousy subscription. Made about 800-1000 dollars in 2 days via western union. Still had about 15-20 hats left so decided to stake them a bit. Won a few…lost a few… sold the rest. Then decided to recheck some characters and found about 20-30 more phats and about 200m cash… still had them up until today when I sold all of it to another player.

I was never caught, I was never banned. Luke did not take care of anything. If the kid was smart at all he would spawn him some gold and sell to players because that makes 1000x what his server makes in donations… It might ruin the economy but who cares the damn servers going to be down when he puts up his new trash server.

Feel free to rant,rave, demand proof… I got all of it.

heres a bit…

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

PS. Luke You Pedo, You can try to retaliate but you will not get me, I use way to many proxies and my real computer ip will not be found. Every ip you try will fail and as I write this I am updating my ip again, BUT PLEASE!! waste your time and try to get me. We all know your going to rage after seeing how much I pwnt you for and how many characters I unbanned with lots and lotsa geepee. Deny it all you want, make up some reasons how I didn’t, everyone here knows how you are, and since i will be banned shortly for showing that I RAT I just gotta say… I look forward to selling all your players gold again in the near future.[/quote]
If you didn’t know, he can easily get you caught, all he has to do is to check which proxy you used, let’s say you use hotspot shield, now, only thing he has to do is to ask who used the ip at the time the char got hacked, and explain why he needs to have it, they will sure give your ip out, because what you do is illegal and against their terms of service. You’re retarded for thinking you can’t get caught just cuz you use proxies.

Read full topic

item.title: Do not play RSCE or RSCDaemon
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“imabeast, post:57, topic:436423”]oh kryptix you amuse me.

I was on a government computer and I already gave the CID on base all the information on him (addresses, phone #s, pm’ed the admin on badsite and got his real ip and a bunch of other shit)

You banned and deleted my character before I “spammed” ingame
And by spam all i did was ask why you banned me for no reason and all you responded with was “i don’t have to answer to anyone”
^ real mature btw

You fuck over people almost every day, people donate for subs and it takes you literally weeks to process them and you only come on and do instanst process when you need the $ (trust me I have reliable sources that tell me that)

Just because you made a server and it got popular because no other server is online, don’t feel “cool” I’ve been in this whole RS thing way longer than you, get your facts straight kiddie[/quote]Now, I hope you’re telling the truth.
But, if it actually wasn’t a government computer, there is nothing that can happen to him.
Also, if it was a government computer, I’d suggest you tell whoever that RSCE is illegal and they’ll forward it to the right people.

Read full topic

item.description:

You banned and deleted my character before I “spammed” ingame
And by spam all i did was ask why you banned me for no reason and all you responded with was “i don’t have to answer to anyone”
